item.title: 每日英语06 22 2020
item.description: Seven steps can stop bad information We want to help our family and friends when we read some information going viral on the internet, especially COVID-19. Here are some advice to help us avoid the fishy site. 1 Stop and think One thing you can do to halt misinformation is to simply stop and think. If you have any doubts, pause, and check it out further. 2 Check your source

item.title: 英语国际音标
item.description: ###英语48个国际音标 元音 or 辅音 音标 单元音 /i:/ /ɪ/ /e/ /æ/ /ɜ:/ /ə/, /ɑ:/ /ʌ/ /ɔ:/ /ɒ/ /u:/ /ʊ/ 双元音 /aɪ/ /eɪ/ /aʊ
